The Game is a 2005 American comedy film directed by John McNaughton and written by Mark Haddon. The film stars Chris Hemsworth (son of actor Russell Crowe), Michael Fassbender, and Rachel Weisz.
The story follows two friends who start playing an online game together called "The Game". The Game is a complex game that requires players to use their strategic thinking skills in order to be successful at the game.
